name: MIBrid MQ
short_description:
MIBrid (Motor Industry Bridge) MQ is an evolved version of DotNetMQ tailored specifically to the Automotive Industry.

The aim of the project is to promote a universal persistent message transmission system for the Automotive Industry.

The system supports persistent messages between users and has support for multiple databases (MS SQL, and DB2).
summary: An evolved version of DotNetMQ specific to the Automotive Industry
